mapper.select: SELECT sa.id ,sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_name,sa.sale_attr_id, sv.id sale_attr_value_id, sv.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.`sale_attr_id`=sv.`sale_attr_id` AND sa.`spu_id`=sv.`spu_id` WHERE sa.`spu_id`=#{spu_id}

select sa.`id`,sa.`spu_id`,sa.`sale_attr_id`, sa.`sale_attr_name`,sv.`id` sale_attr_value_id , sv.`sale_attr_value_name`,skv.`sku_id`, IF(skv.`sku_id` IS NULL,0,1) is_check from spu_sale_attr sa inner join spu_sale_attr_value sv on sa.`sale_attr_id`=sv.`sale_attr_id` and sa.`spu_id`=sv.`spu_id` left join sku_sale_attr_value skv on sv.`id`=skv.`sale_attr_value_id` and sku_id=#{skuId} where sa.`spu_id`=#{spuId} ORDER BY sv.sale_attr_id,sv.id
